description: Individuals who are currently or have been previously suscribed to this list, including members who have bounced or unsubscribed.
title: List Members

___language.description: If set/detected, the language of the subscriber.
___language.title: Language

___timestamp_opt.description: Date and time the subscribe confirmed their opt-in status.
___timestamp_opt.title: Opt-in Timestamp

___unique_email_id.description: An identifier for the address across all of MailChimp.
___unique_email_id.title: Unique Email ID

___last_changed.description: Date and time the member's info was last changed.
___last_changed.title: Last Changed Date

___stats.description: General open rates for this subscriber.
___stats.title: Subscriber Stats

___member_rating.description: Star rating for this member between 1 and 5.
___member_rating.title: Member Rating

___interests.description: The key of this object's properties is the ID of the interest in question.
___interests.title: Subscriber Interests

___timestamp_signup.description: Date and time the subscriber signed up for the list.
___timestamp_signup.title: Signup Timestamp

___ip_opt.description: IP address the subscriber confirmed their opt-in status.
___ip_opt.title: Opt-in IP

___last_note.description: The most recent Note added about this member.
___last_note.title: Notes

___created_at.description: The date the note was created.
___created_at.title: Created Time

___note.title: Note
___note.example: Urist McVankab visited the new records page today, but didn't make a purchase.

___status_if_new.description: Subscriber's status ('subscribed', 'unsubscribed', 'cleaned', or 'pending'), to be used only on a PUT request if the email is not already present on the list.
___status_if_new.title: Default Status

___ip_signup.description: IP address the subscriber signed up from.
___ip_signup.title: Signup IP

___email_client.description: The email client the address as using.
___email_client.title: Email Client

___id.description: The MD5 hash of the list member's email address.
___id.title: Email ID

$eref.description: An individual merge var and value for a member.
$eref.title: Member Merge Var

___email_type.description: Type of email this member asked to get ('html' or 'text').
___email_type.title: Email Type
